channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: “I changed my mind”

item.title: Sincerity is expected
item.description: Well, not always. That’s why it’s so important. We don’t expect an actor to tell the truth. That’s their job. Musicians and other performers are playi...

item.title: CVS Health Taps Physician To Lead Healthcare Delivery Business

item.title: Takeaways From Gwern Branwen’s Thoughts On AI Writing
item.description: That makes Branwen an outlier from day one, in a field where the majority of professionals distinguish themselves by learning Python and Javascript.

item.title: How to buy a lottery ticket

item.title: Meta’s Quest 3 Will Be Able To Turn Into A Windows 11 PC
item.description: In December Meta and Microsoft will launch a preview version of full integration of Windows 11 with the Quest 3 and Quest 3S headsets.

item.title: Why Wildfires Are Becoming More Frequent And Devastating
item.description: Rising temperatures, prolonged droughts and bad planning are fueling more frequent, intense wildfires across the United States.

item.title: Bose Corporation Snaps Up High-End Audio Brand McIntosh
item.description: Iconic audio brands will combine 175 years of technology, innovation and craftsmanship to deliver transformative sound experiences.
